snippet.title: Mini Airways - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Mini Airways is set to release on July 31!

Mini Airways is a real-time management game where you play the role of an air traffic controller. Clear your aircraft to takeoff & land, direct them to the destination...and most of all don't let them crash!!

【Here's what awaits you in the release version 】
◆ Fast-paced, real-time ATC gameplay
◆ Distinctive global maps
◆ Airspace upgrades
◆ Surprise random events
◆ Three selectable modes
◆ Hardcore MODs
◆ Steam Achievements

Steam link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2289650/Mini_Airways/
Discord: https://discord.gg/HTdXFz5jWg
Twitter: https://x.com/NpaMiniAir

Happy landings! See you at launch!
